bt.metainfo

Interface IMetadataService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MetadataService

    public interface IMetadataService
    Service for creating torrents from bencoded sources.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Torrent fromByteArray(byte[] bs)
      Builds a torrent object from its binary representation.
      Torrent fromInputStream(InputStream in)
      Builds a torrent object from its binary representation.
      Torrent fromUrl(URL url)
      Builds a torrent object from its binary representation located at url.

    • Method Detail

      • fromUrl

        Torrent fromUrl(URL url)
        Builds a torrent object from its binary representation located at url.
        Parameters:
        url - Binary bencoded representation of a torrent object
        Returns:
        Torrent object.
        Since:
        1.0

      • fromInputStream

        Torrent fromInputStream(InputStream in)
        Builds a torrent object from its binary representation.
        Parameters:
        in - Input stream, containing a bencoded representation. Caller should close the stream after the method has returned.
        Returns:
        Torrent object.
        Since:
        1.0

      • fromByteArray

        Torrent fromByteArray(byte[] bs)
        Builds a torrent object from its binary representation.
        Parameters:
        bs - binary bencoded representation of a torrent object
        Returns:
        Torrent object.
        Since:
        1.0
